title: [Alert - Shots Fired]
updates: ShotSpotter technology has detected two rounds of possible gunshots coming from the rooftop. ShotSpotter devices pick up gunshots or similar loud noises, such as fireworks or backfiring vehicles. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 9-02 27th Ave. The address reported for this incident has changed to 8-10 27th Ave. Police are responding to reports of a shooting where a person was shot in the leg. The suspect has fled the scene. Police are conducting a hospital canvass after finding a shell casing in the parking lot. Radio clips available.

title: [Alert - Armed Suspect]
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 222 Stuyvesant Ave. Police are responding to a report of a man who robbed a person and fled eastbound on Monroe Street. Police are mobilizing additional units in response to a confirmed firearm incident, with the suspect last seen fleeing eastbound on Monroe Street. Radio clips available.

title: Three Disabled MTA Buses
updates: Incident reported at 153-16 Sanford Ave. A Citizen user shows video of three disabled MTA buses stopped in the middle of a road possibly due to snowy road conditions. Use caution while driving in the area.

title: Report of Ten Gunshots Heard
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 71st Ave & 141st St. Police have received a report of ten gunshots heard. No suspect description has been provided.

title: Smoke Condition Due to Burnt Item
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at Wilson Av Station (L). Firefighters are responding to a report of a smoke condition due to a burnt item. Radio clips available.

title: Police Activity
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at Metropolitan Ave & Pleasantview St. Police are responding to a report of a person who may need assistance.

title: People Stuck in Disabled Elevator
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 100-26 67th Rd. Firefighters are responding to a 911 report of people stuck in a disabled elevator.

title: Driver Trapped After Crash
updates: Police have received a report of a driver trapped after a crash. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 6636 Woodhaven Blvd.

title: Vehicle Crash
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 66th Pl & Otto Rd. Police have received a 911 report of a vehicle crash.

title: Fire in Apartment at Ravenswood Houses
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 35-20 24th St. Firefighters are on the scene of a fire in an apartment at the Ravenswood Houses. Firefighters are responding to a reported fire at a bar in Queens, following an earlier apartment fire incident. Firefighters have not found any signs of fire in the reported area after a thorough search. Firefighters have confirmed a kitchen fire at the location and are currently addressing the situation. Firefighters have water on the kitchen fire and are actively working to extinguish it. Radio clips available. Firefighters report the kitchen fire is nearly extinguished, with no occupants found. Current response will be maintained.

title: Vehicle Collision
updates: Incident reported at 107-22 67th Ave. Approved by the Citizen community Citizen user @WRauf shows video of a vehicle collision in the area. Please exercise caution nearby. Go LIVE or comment below to share real-time updates from the scene.

title: Fire Department Activity
updates: Incident reported at 40-07 12th St. A Citizen user shows video of firefighters in the area. Do you have more information? Go LIVE or comment below to share real-time updates from the scene.

title: Odor of Gas in Lobby
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 419 E 82nd St. Firefighters have received a report of an odor of gas in the lobby.

title: Smoke Condition in Apartment Building
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 106-35 159th St. Police have received a report of smoke in an apartment building. Firefighters have also been notified.

title: Report of Person Robbed at Gunpoint
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 83-75 118th St. Police have received a report of a person robbed at gunpoint.

title: Report of Person Shot
updates: Police have received a report of a person who was shot. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 104-56 41st Ave. Radio clips available.

title: Steam From Manhole
updates: Firefighters are responding to a report of a manhole fire. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at Steinway St & Broadway. Firefighters have determined the issue is steam from the manhole, not a fire, and have notified the utility company.

title: Manhole Fire
updates: Firefighters have received a report of a manhole fire. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 65th St & 65th Pl.

title: Smoking Transformer
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 181 E 90th St. Firefighters are responding to a 911 report of a smoking manhole. Firefighters have identified a smoking transformer and are notifying utility services for further assistance.

title: Officer Requesting Backup
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 30th Ave & 38th St. Police have received a report of an officer requesting backup. It is unclear what assistance is needed.
